'''Captain Vilami''' is a character in {{poe2}}. He can be found guarding the vault in [Bardatto Estate](/bardattoEstate/).

## Background

Calm and polite, Vilami is the Guard-Captain charged with protecting the many valuables entrusted to the [Bardatto family](/bardattoFamily/) bank.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Family Pride](/familyPride/)
|none            = 
|other           = Politely kicks you out when you first approach the gates of the vault.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Family Pride](/familyPride/): He defends the vault. After learning of the [Valera](/valeraFamily/)-driven plot on the vault, he coordinates a trap for the would-be thieves. You can assist in defending the Bardatto vault, or can salvage the plot after it results in a stalemate.

## =Other interactions

=
* Vilami spots you immediately the first time you attempt to approach the vault gates, even if you are sneaking. He is not as vigilant and dutiful on subsequent attempts and you can safely pickpocket him and the other guards within the carpeted stretch of the hallway.
* Getting caught by any guards deeper in the vault results in Vilami and all his men turning hostile. You can sneak past them with high enough [Stealth](/stealth/).
* If you kill Vilami and his guards, you can still leave without further incidents. However, if you approach [Ezzali Bardatto](/ezzaliBardatto/) again, the upper level of the estate turns hostile as well.
